actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to commend the Florida Agricultural and Mechanical University football team on becoming the only NCAA football team to finish its season unbeaten and untied.

summary.text: Extends the commendation of the Senate to the Florida Agricultural and Mechanical University football team for attaining a perfect, unbeaten and untied record for the 1977 season.

titles.title: A resolution to commend the Florida Agricultural and Mechanical University football team on becoming the only NCAA football team to finish its season unbeaten and untied.
